mn76:16.11: mahākappino → mahākappuno (bj, pts1ed) | cullāsīti → cūḷāsīti (sya-all, km)
mn76:30.2: tattha tattha → tathā tathā (bj, sya-all, km, pts1ed)
mn76:30.3: aññathātipi → aññathāpi (bj, pts1ed) | tathātipi → tathāpi (bj, pts1ed) | evantipi → evampi (bj, pts1ed)
mn76:33.1: tāni → idaṁ padaṁ bj, sya-all, pts1ed potthakesu
mn76:35-42.4: Yasmiṁ kho → yasmiṁ kho pana (sya-all, km, mr)
